content: कूट् {vI.v} {c10c} <ab>A.</ab> (कूटयते, कूटित) {@--1@} To abstain from giving, not to give. {@--2@} To censure. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To burn. {@--2@} To call, invite. {@--3@} To render confused, to muddle. {@--4@} To be distressed. {@--5@} To despair. {@--6@} To counsel, advise.
